name: Yuki Nime
description:
Explore a dreamlike and restless world, discoverer all its secrets...

Controls

WASD | Arrows Keys: Move (in 8 directions)

Z: Interact

Space | Enter: Select, Dream Menu

F4: Fullscreen

Version 0.16

  • 4  Main dream worlds
  • 7 Worlds to explore from there
  • 2 Effects
  • ? Events

(For a best experience, Download the Windows Version)
